message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents value at the beginning of the period from the provided cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see the section "Cash and Cash Equivalents" which contains the following line items:
- Beginning Balance: 8000000.00
- Ending Balance: 5580980.91
- Net Increase: -2419019.09

The "Beginning Balance" represents the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period, which is 8000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
